item.description:
Happy hourers will hang once again at Coogan's in the Faneuil Hall area to imbibe social lubricants.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5:30 PM and hang until ????

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

**** 99 cent appetizers available 4pm til 7pm ****

Free Baileys, Kahlua, Malibu, Grand Marnier chocolate treats for everyone.

Trivia contest begins at 7.

CONGRATULATIONS to the Happy Hour Trivia Royalty (Beth, Pete, Elisa, Patrick, and Susan) for placing second, last time. BTW they chose "Where's Stephanie?" for their team name, in honor of absent Trivia Queen, Stephanie (of course).

Come play Rock Band (video game created by the same local company which developed Guitar Hero ). We rock about 9:30. No musical talent required. Instruments; lead guitar, bass, drums, and voice.

Coogan's Web Page

If you come hungry here's Coogan's Menu. Great burgers, steak tips, pizza, and $2 Coors. Ask about their filling $7 entrees.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU


Stump! Trivia rules:

1) To be eligible for prizes a teams maximum number players is six. Be aware if a team with less than six players has one of the top three scores, that team would win first or second place.

2) The trivia jockey (TJ) provides Stump! sheets, on which to keep your team score. Write the categories as the TJ reads them, and keep track of the points you've wagered.

3) When the TJ asks a question, you have one song to write your team name, your answer, and your wager on an answer ticket and hand it in. You can wager 1, 3, 5, or 7 points in the first two quarters, and 2, 4, 6, or 8 points in the last two quarters. You can only use each value ONCE per quarter.

4) There are three bonus rounds where you can earn lots of extra points! Your TJ will explain how they work.

5) No shouting out any answers, and absolutely no using cellphones/other devices to look up answers! Teams that break this rule are disqualified.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be seated at the end of the bar furthest from the entrance and should be the only one wearing a Happy New Year tiara.
item.name: It's Thirsty Thursday, So It's Time For Coogan's Again
